content.rendered:
Jeremy Biron is the founder of Forecastly. He has been selling on Amazon for over 10 years so he has a really deep understanding of the marketplace and of Amazon inventory management and the issues that can involve.

He was one of the first FBA sellers in the office supply space running a multi-million dollar operation. Jeremy has a strong knowledge of Amazon and what it takes to maintain your Amazon inventory.

Jeremy was working in the corporate world doing marketing and sales. Quickly realized that the corporate life wasn’t for him. He got into selling  Amazon inventory  part-time while working the corporate job. He happened upon office supplies. Not the sexiest products but he found a place. He realized that he could make more money selling on Amazon than in his full-time job and he enjoyed it much more.

He started selling full-time 8 years ago. Then, about 2 years ago, the office supply space wasn’t going in the right direction. He heard from a lot of other FBA sellers about their Amazon inventory issues. Jeremy had the answer. He had custom software they used in-house. He decided to take this software, improve it so it could be mass-distributed, and began Forecastly.

Interviews

144 Amazon Inventory with Jeremy Biron of Forecastly Part 1 of 3

We have Jeremy Biron, the founder of Forecasterly, on the show today. Forecastly is a tool that helps manage your Amazon inventory.

145 Amazon Inventory Management with Jeremy Biron of Forecastly Part 2 of 3

One of the biggest issues with Amazon inventory management is excess inventory. It’s something everyone deals with. There are several options to consider.

146 FBA Inventory Management with Jeremy Biron of Forecastly Part 3 of 3

There are many things to consider when dealing with FBA inventory. Jeremy Biron is with us today to help clear up some of these issues.
